document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial on charges he paid an underage teenager for sex opened on wednesday and was adjourned until may 31 after a hearing that lasted just 10 minutes.
document.title: berlusconi sex trial opens, immediately adjourned
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial on charges he paid an underage teenager for sex opened on wednesday and was adjourned until may 31 after a hearing that lasted just 10 minutes.
